description: Interface for shield studies, for use by `background.js` scripts.

functions.name: enroll
functions.description:
Attempt an enrollment, with these effects
- IFF firstRun
  - send 'enter' ping
  - if eligible, send 'install' ping
  - else endStudy("ineligible")
- setActiveExperiment(studyConfig)

Note:
1. first run is tracked in a pref
2. eligible is ONLY used during first run (install)

all for side effects (setActiveExperiment)

Will fire
- study:ready
- study:endStudy

functions.name: endStudy
functions.description: Optionally opens url, then ends study with pings ending, exit.  Study can only have one ending.  Uninstalls addon?
functions.returns: directions for what to do next by the addon

functions.name: info
functions.description: current study configuration, including set variation, activeExperimentName

functions.name: dataPermissions
functions.description: object of current dataPermissions with keys shield, pioneer, telemetry, 'ok'

functions.name: getTelemetry
functions.description: for isEligible, testing, and other uses, get recent stored Telemetry pings

functions.name: deterministicVariation
functions.returns: Name of a variation from weightedVariations

functions.name: surveyUrl
functions.description:
Format url with study covariate queryArgs appended / mixed in.

Use this for constructing midpoint surveys.

functions.name: validateJSON
functions.description: Using AJV, do jsonschema validation of an object.  Can be used to validate your arguments, packets at client.
functions.returns: a validation object - { bool valid, array errors }

events.name: onDataPermissionsChange
events.description: Fires whenever any 'dataPermission' changes, with the new dataPermission object.  Allows watching for shield or pioneer revocation.

events.name: onEnroll
events.description: Fires when the study is 'ready' for the feature to startup.

events.name: onEndStudy
events.description: Listen for when the study wants to end
